member.name: STORAGE_QUERY_TYPE
member.summary: Used by the structure passed to the IOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY control code to indicate what information is returned about a property of a storage device or adapter.

member.name: STORAGE_QUERY_TYPE.PropertyStandardQuery
member.summary: Instructs the driver to return an appropriate descriptor.

member.name: STORAGE_QUERY_TYPE.PropertyExistsQuery
member.summary: Instructs the driver to report whether the descriptor is supported.

member.name: STORAGE_QUERY_TYPE.PropertyMaskQuery
member.summary: Not currently supported. Do not use.

member.name: STORAGE_QUERY_TYPE.PropertyQueryMaxDefined
member.summary: Specifies the upper limit of the list of query types. This is used to validate the query type.
